_xResult.title: Every Monday Midi Dress
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made fall/winter felted cotton dress with stitch details
_xResult.longdesc:
This short dress is high quality handmade felted cotton which feels a bit like sweatshirt material but more structured and formal. This cotton with elastic dress for women to order in your exact choice of colors and sized to fit your body. It is a truly unique piece, accurate and high quality work. Handmade from soft felted cotton fabric with a touch of elastic to give it shape and comfort.

 

Unique details include:

  • Comes in many colors, please specify preference
  • "Sculptured" fabric which give is unique shape and flow as you move
  • Attached natural stones on hem and neck
  • Cowl neck
  • Asymmetrical hem, ruched sleeves
  • Pullover style 

 

Made to order special for You and Your dimensions. Plus size clothing is available as well.

 

The wholesomeness of the landscape and the vast expanse of nature that surround me is my inspiration. The geometric patterns of the tree trunks in the forest, the rise and fall of the waves in the sea, the colors of the passing seasons: all these elements come together when I produce my hand-sewn fabrics. I begin with rolls of plain material and sew hundreds of small seams onto it, creating my own unique "textured" cloth. Once this is complete, I begin to design my linen clothing . Another technique that I use is a distinctive, never-to-be-repeated embroidered heartscape onto fabric which is then sewn into reversible linen jackets , linen coats . Apparel from this texturized material will not become wrinkly-wherever you go may simply pack them to your travel bag-no additional ironing is needed before you wear this women clothing . Choose the first your eyes stop on and you simply look special! 

 

With love,

Aiste

properties.propvalue: Spot clean, or hand wash cold
